name: Vase mounted in gilt bronze
maker: Unknown, Mounts attributed to Pierre Gouthière
description: Vase mounted in gilt bronze; Unknown, Mounts attributed to Pierre Gouthière (French, 1732 - 1813/1814, master 1758); Paris, France; porcelain about 1662 - 1722; mounts about 1770; Hard-paste porcelain with gilt bronze mounts; 54.2 x 27 x 25 cm (21 5/16 x 10 5/8 x 9 13/16 in.); 87.DI.137; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Vase mounted in gilt bronze
medium: Hard-paste porcelain with gilt bronze mounts
